metadata.name: Dispatcher
metadata.description: Injects the Swiz shared event bus

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: Instructs Swiz to inject the global (root) event bus or the one local to the containing Swiz instance (if there are multiple instances)

metadata.name: Inject
metadata.description: Marks a dependency for injection by Swiz

attribute.name: destination
attribute.description: Name of the property to inject into

attribute.name: source
attribute.description: Id of the named bean to inject

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Denotes whether or not Swiz should throw an error if the dependency cannot be found

attribute.name: bind
attribute.description: Denotes whether or not Swiz should create a binding (requires that all necessary pieces are marked [Bindable])

attribute.name: twoWay
attribute.description: Denotes whether or not Swiz should create a twoWay binding (requires that all necessary pieces are marked [Bindable])

metadata.name: EventHandler
metadata.description: Marks this method as a system event handler

attribute.name: event
attribute.description: The system event this method should handle. MyEvent.TYPE format is recommended but string value also supported.

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: Instructs Swiz to create an event listener on the global (root) event bus or the one local to the containing Swiz instance (if there are multiple instances)

attribute.name: properties
attribute.description: Comma separated list of public properties that should be pulled off of the event and passed to the decorated method.

attribute.name: priority
attribute.description: Priority to use in the addEventListener call Swiz makes behind the scenes.

attribute.name: useCapture
attribute.description: Determines useCapture flag in the addEventListener call Swiz makes behind the scenes.

attribute.name: stopPropagation
attribute.description: If true, Swiz will call event.stopPropagation() after running the decorated method

attribute.name: stopImmediatePropagation
attribute.description: If true, Swiz will call event.stopImmediatePropagation() after running the decorated method

metadata.name: PostConstruct
metadata.description: Marks this method to be called after all injections are fulfilled

attribute.name: order
attribute.description: Position in which to call the decorated method if there are multiple [PostConstruct] methods. Called in ascending order.

metadata.name: PreDestroy
metadata.description: Marks this method to be called before all injections are nullified

attribute.name: order
attribute.description: Position in which to call the decorated method if there are multiple [PreDestroy] methods. Called in ascending order.
